pageProduct.name: Vicks VapoDrops + Anti-Inflammatory Lemon Menthol 36 Lozenges
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks VapoDrops + Anti-Inflammatory lozenges are specially formulated to relieve cough, clear blocked nose and soothe sore throat. It also contains Turmeric to help relieve inflammation, a cause of sore throat. Available in 2 flavours: Honey Menthol and Lemon Menthol

Size: 36 Lozenges

KEY FEATURES

• Vicks VapoDrops + Anti-Inflammatory lozenges provides 4-in-1 relief for:
• 1. Cough
• 2. Blocked Nose
• 3. Sore Throat
• 4. Inflamation
